pkgmetadata.longdescription: nft-blackhole is a daemon for blocking IP addresses based on country or blacklists, using nftables. It can download publicly available blacklists and block IPs from them, block or whitelist countries, whitelist specific networks or IP addresses, and supports automatic retry on failed downloads with atomic operations to prevent loading incomplete rulesets.

use.flag: Enable IPv6 support (use nftables 'inet' table for dual-stack, disable for IPv4-only 'ip' table)
Install systemd service files for automatic daemon management
